Language.Name: English
Language.ScanAll: Download new servers and update all servers (F5).
Language.SearchButton: Search for server by servername or IP address.
Language.QuickConnect: Quick connect to a server by the IP address entered in the search field.
Language.AddToFavorites: Add selected or server IP from the search to favorites.
Language.FontButton: Switch between color encoded fonts to non-color encoded fonts.
Language.DownloadButton: A new version is available for download!
Language.NewVersionDetected: Game Scanner has detected a new version available for download.\Would like to download it?
Language.ErrorPrivatePassword: Please select a server before setting a private password!
Language.ErrorServerCopyToClipBoard: Please select a server before trying to copy it to clipboard!
Language.ErrorLaunchingGame: Invalid game path! Reason: Install path may not be correct or doesn't exsist. Solution: Go to the Options then setup the game paths correct.
Language.ErrorDownloadingUpdate: New Game Scanner version has been detected! Error downloading file(s)! Do you want to go to the website and download it manually?
Language.SelectServerAtConnectionRCON: Please select a server before connecting to Remote Console!
Language.AskDeleteServerList: Are you sure you want to delete all servers including favorites?
Language.ErrorDeletingServerList: You can't delete while scanning/updating servers!
Language.MenuModifyMinPly: &Modify minimum players a server must have.
Language.MenuModifyMaxPly: Modify ma&ximum players a server must have.
Language.MessageNoGamesActive: You need to configure atleast one active game. Do you want to to configure it now?
Language.MessageBuddyNotOnline: Selected buddy isn't playing on any server!
Language.MessageErrorConnecting: Please select a server before trying to connect!
Language.StatusReceivingMaster: Received %d new %s servers from master server.
Language.StatusNewVersion: *** New version %s is available for download.***
Language.AskRconKickPlayer: Are you sure you want to kick player?
Language.AlertRestartRequired: You need to restart Game Scanner to apply the change!
Language.AskToUpdate: Do you want to download and install the update?
Language.CFGTextVersion: Launch when Version is equal to:
Language.CFGTextMod: Launch when Mod name is equal to:
Language.MessageInstance: You can only run one instance of Game Scanner!
Language.ValveMasterStatus: Recieved %d new %s servers from master server (Region %s).
Language.NoName: Ensure that a Name is entered.
Language.StatusNumVisible: Number of visible %s servers in the list %d of %d.
Language.RCONErrorConnecting: Error connecting to the remote console.
Language.RCONErrorCommand: Error sending command! Password may be invalid.
Language.ImportServerListLabel: Choose which game to import serverlist into.
Language.ExportServerListLabel: Choose which game to export serverlist from.
